website_summaries.verdict: The 15.6-inch Lenovo ThinkPad L580 is one of the most appealing office desktop-replacement laptops you can find for less than $1,000.

customer_reviews.title: Docking station for 250 euro.
customer_reviews.text: This docking station is very expensive, but this is the one that has 2 HDMI ports. A bit slow when connects to the laptop, takes a few seconds to kick on screens or may not kick on at all. Then i have to disconnect laptop and connect again. 250 quit and this is not a perfect product. I do not mention charging over USB, may work or may not.
customer_reviews.author: itcyclone

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Universal USB-C Docking Station - Very Reliable
customer_reviews.text: An expensive little unit but it is very well made and proving very reliable, contrary to some of the negative reviews here. We have 35+ units connecting multiple devices from Macbooks to Ultrabooks and have found that aby problens are either down to drivers or the USB-C port of the connecting device. The docking stations will allow you to do the following via ONE USB-C cable Charge your Phone, laptop or tablet Display your device to 2x screens Hook up 2x USB 2, 3x USB 3 (one charging) and 1x USB-C 3 device. This has been the most universal and reliable docking station I have ever used and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Works or doesnt. it will choose for you
customer_reviews.text: Thats my second lenovo >200£ docking station and second failure. both behave hectic, disconnect usb or screens, (nothing wrong with my pc as other docking stations with DisplayLink work fine, i just needed something reliable for my other setup and this was recommended) first plugin - screens work, usb doesnt second - usb works, ethernet doesnt, one screen does. firmware upgrade. stuck halfway luckily didnt brick. anthing but not plug and play. (maybe plug the hair out of your head) terrible products from lenovo. was thinking aboud buying carbon x1 - no way now after this. cant even make a simple docking station.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Kurzewski

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my Lenovo Yoga laptop
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fully featured USB-C dock. Works perfectly with my new Lenovo Yoga laptop. Drives two additional HDMI monitors, my wired mouse and Ethernet cable. Very large power supply which is larger than the Yoga laptop power supply !
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Port replicator!
customer_reviews.text: Simply fantastic!!! I have 3 screens including base laptop , others connected via Display port.. the port replicator handles all 3 with ease.. simple setup and installation, works effortlessly. Tried more expensive ones, all seem to have Chinese plugs with converters, this one doesn't, just works from get go..
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great condition - great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item, basically as new apart from a small scratch on the front that you can hardly see. All leads etc included and everything in full working order, for about half the price of the same thing on the Lenovo website.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Very good and quality product
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for quick delivery and quality product. Only backside is that plug is European. It will be nice to include UK plug for UK orders.
customer_reviews.author: Areg Vrtanesyan

customer_reviews.title: EU cable and not UK
customer_reviews.text: Though the FAQs say that the product comes with UK cable, I received a cable which is compatible with EU plugs. That is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good hub
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent bit of kit. Works on laptop and desktop.
customer_reviews.author: tomnorris

customer_reviews.title: Job Done
customer_reviews.text: There is a "Gen 2" version of this but the original is cheaper, so I went with it. There could be more USB ports; generally it works well with my Lenovo C930 laptop. However there have been occasions when the connection to my monitor and external drives was lost - and I don't yet understand why. I also cannot understand what the button on the device is meant to do. However I have one monitor and three hard drives running from it and it charges my laptop at the same time, so all of my objectives for it have been met.
customer_reviews.author: SAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works really well with both my laptops through the usb and usb c ports. Really would work with any laptop
customer_reviews.author: Gursh
